records.question: What is the return policy?
records.answer: Items can be returned within 30 days of purchase with original receipt. Refunds will be processed to the original payment method within 5-7 business days.

records.question: Do you ship internationally?
records.answer: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries worldwide. International shipping typically takes 7-14 business days and costs vary by destination. Please note that customs fees may apply.

records.question: What payment methods do you accept?
records.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal, and Apple Pay. All payments are processed securely through our encrypted payment system.
